ygData.subject: Re: Re: Anyone know anything about Peral Shard?
ygData.msgSnippet: Dont know, but mabye you can help me.  What is a Jade shard good for?  Is this also a magician item? Cogg - Rallos/Tallon zek ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Dont know, but mabye you can help me. What is a Jade shard good for? Is
this also a magician item?

Cogg - Rallos/Tallon zek
----- Original Message -----
From: <PRIMEhero@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 3:39 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Anyone know anything about Peral Shard?


> From: PRIMEhero@...
>
> In a message dated 8/3/99 7:54:10 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
> eqenchanters@onelist.com writes:
>
> << Date: Mon, 2 Aug 1999 14:26:49 -0500
> From: "Dest" <dragon@...>
> Subject: Anyone know anything about Peral Shard?(nt) >>
>
> I'm thinking this is a typo in your Subject line and you mean a Pearl
> Shard. The Pearl Shard is a Magician Spell Research item for some of their
> midlevel spells and I've never heard of any jewelry being constructed from
it.
> If, however, you actually DO mean to ask about a Peral Shard, then
I've
> not the slightest idea having never used such personally.
